statements: SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE subscription_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, subscription_status FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE subscription_status = 'Active' AND renewal_date IS NULL;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date, renewal_date FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 'a60740d4-98f0-4c9a-b194-399f364ebee2'
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE subscription_status = 'Active'
SELECT customer_id, end_date, renewal_date FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, start_date, end_date, subscription_status FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE subscription_status = 'Active' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, start_date, end_date, renewal_date FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 'b1d5c55b-3913-4c06-879b-6bf8e92e94b7' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT subscription_type, customer_name, subscription_start_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type FROM customers WHERE subscription_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY subscription_start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type, subscription_end_date FROM customers WHERE subscription_type LIKE '%Gold%' AND subscription_end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_start_date FROM customers ORDER BY subscription_start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type, subscription_start_date, subscription_end_date FROM customers WHERE subscription_type = 'Gold' AND subscription_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN subscriptions s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.subscription_type = 'Platinum';
SELECT customer_id, subscription_type, COUNT(*) AS total_subscriptions FROM subscriptions GROUP BY customer_id, subscription_type ORDER BY total_subscriptions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name,subscription_type FROM customers WHERE subscription_type = 'Basic';
SELECT customer_id,subscription_start_date FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM renewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id,subscription_type,subscription_start_date,subscription_end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type FROM customers WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type FROM customers ORDER BY subscription_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions INNER JOIN customers ON subscriptions.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, renewal_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_status FROM Customers WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT * FROM Subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type FROM Customers JOIN Subscriptions ON Customers.customer_id = Subscriptions.customer_id ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type, start_date, end_date FROM Customers JOIN Subscriptions ON Customers.customer_id = Subscriptions.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, payment_date, payment_amount FROM Customers JOIN Subscriptions ON Customers.customer_id = Subscriptions.customer_id JOIN Renewals ON Subscriptions.subscription_id = Renewals.subscription_id JOIN Payments ON Renewals.renewal_id = Payments.renewal_id;

SELECT customer_name, renewal_id, renewal_date, payment_amount FROM Customers JOIN Subscriptions ON Customers.customer_id = Subscriptions.customer_id JOIN Renewals ON Subscriptions.subscription_id = Renewals.subscription_id JOIN Payments ON Renewals.renewal_id = Payments.renewal_id WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, subscription_type FROM Customers JOIN Subscriptions ON Customers.customer_id = Subscriptions.customer_id ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, start_date, end_date FROM customers WHERE subscription_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, address_line, city, state, postal_code FROM addresses WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE subscription_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE start_date <= '2022-10-15';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, subscription_id FROM customers ORDER BY subscription_id DESC, last_name ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, a.address_line, a.city, a.state, a.postal_code FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE c.subscription_id = 1;
